description.koreana: 저주받은 도시 프라그를 공성하고 약탈하세요.
description.spanish: Asedia y saquea la ciudad maldita de Praag.
description.schinese: 围攻并洗劫诅咒城市普拉格
description.tchinese: 圍攻並洗劫詛咒城市普拉格。
description.russian: Осадите и разорите проклятый город Прааг.
description.polish: Oblegaj i złup przeklęte miasto Praag.
description.czech: Obléhej a vyrabuj prokleté město Praag.
description.turkish: Praag'in lanetli şehrini kuşat ve yağmala.
description.brazilian: Cerque e pilhe a cidade amaldiçoada de Praag.

description.english: Playing as the Empire, raze the Dwarfs' capital at Karaz-a-Karak.
description.german: Reißt als das Imperium die zwergische Hauptstadt bei Karaz-A-Karak nieder.
description.french: Incarnez l'Empire et rasez Karaz-a-Karak, la capitale naine.
description.italian: Giocando con l'Impero, radi al suolo la capitale dei Nani a Karaz-a-Karak.
description.koreana: 제국으로 진행하여 드워프의 수도 카라즈 아 카라크를 파괴하세요.
description.spanish: Jugando con el Imperio, arrasa la capital Enana de Karaz-a-Karak.
description.schinese: 扮演帝国，毁灭矮人首都卡拉扎-阿-卡拉克
description.tchinese: 扮演帝國，毀滅矮人首都卡拉茲·阿·卡拉克。
description.russian: Играя за Империю, разрушьте гномью столицу Караз-а-Карак.
description.polish: Grając Imperium, zniszcz stolicę krasnoludów – Karaz-a-Karak.
description.czech: Hraj za Říši a srovnej se zemí hlavní město trpaslíků, Karaz-a-Karak.
description.turkish: İmparatorluk olarak Karaz-a-Karak'ta Cüceler'in başkentini ele geçir ya da yerle bir et.
description.brazilian: Jogando com o Império, devaste a Capital dos Anões em Karaz-a-Karak.

displayName.french: L'odeur de dîner en train de brûler...

description.english: Besiege and raze the Halflings' Moot.

description.turkish: Buçukluk Moot'unu kuşat ve yerle bir et.
description.brazilian: Cerque e devaste o Moot dos Halflings.

description.schinese: 扮演吸血鬼伯爵，为麾下一支军队招募一辆黑马车

description.english: Have at least 10 Trolls or 10 Chaos Trolls in a single army.

description.french: Intégrez au moins 10 Trolls ou 10 Trolls du Chaos dans une seule et même armée.

description.spanish: Ten al menos 10 Trolls o 10 Trolls del Caos en un solo ejército.

description.polish: Zwerbuj do jednej armii przynajmniej 10 trolli lub trolli Chaosu.
description.czech: Měj v jedné armádě alespoň 10 trollů nebo 10 trollů Chaosu.
description.turkish: Tek bir orduda en az 10 Trol veya 10 Kaos Trolü bulunsun.
description.brazilian: Controle no mínimo 10 Trolls ou 10 Trolls do Caos em um só exército.

description.english: Have at least 10 Chaos Knights in a single army.

description.turkish: Muharebelerde 250.000 düşman öldür.
description.brazilian: Mate 250.000 inimigos em batalhas.

description.english: Successfully besiege and capture a city by seizing its victory points during a campaign battle.
description.german: Belagert und erobert eine Stadt durch Einnahme ihrer Siegespunkte in einem Kampagnengefecht.
description.french: Assiégez et capturez une cité en vous emparant de ses points de victoire lors d'une bataille de campagne.
description.italian: Assedia e conquista una città aggiudicandoti i suoi punti vittoria durante una battaglia della campagna.
description.koreana: 캠페인 전투에서 공성을 하고 승리 지점을 장악하여 도시를 점령하세요.
description.spanish: Asedia con éxito y captura una ciudad conquistando sus puntos de victoria durante una batalla de campaña.
description.schinese: 通过在战役战斗中夺占胜利点的方式攻克并占领一座城镇
description.tchinese: 在戰役戰鬥中以奪佔勝利點的方式攻克並佔領一座城鎮。
description.russian: Захватите осажденный город с помощью точек победы в одной из битв кампании.
description.polish: W trakcie kampanii oblegaj i zdobądź miasto, zajmując w nim punkty strategiczne.
description.czech: V průběhu kampaně úspěšně obléhej město a zaber ho tak, že obsadíš jeho vítězné pozice.
description.turkish: Bir sefer muharebesi esnasında, bir şehri başarıyla kuşat ve zafer noktalarını hükmün altına alarak ele geçir.
description.brazilian: Cerque e capture uma cidade, dominando os pontos de vitória dela em uma batalha de campanha.

displayName.french: Dur comme le fer et en pétard
displayName.spanish: Máz Duro k'el Azero y Kabreao

description.english: Win a campaign battle, having completely wiped out all enemy units.
description.german: Gewinnt ein Kampagnengefecht durch vollständiges Auslöschen aller feindlichen Einheiten.
description.french: Remportez une bataille de campagne en exterminant toutes les unités ennemies.
description.italian: Vinci una battaglia della campagna distruggendo tutte le unità nemiche.
description.koreana: 모든 적 부대를 완전히 전멸시켜서 캠페인 전투에서 승리하세요.
description.spanish: Gana una batalla de campaña eliminando por completo todas las unidades enemigas.
description.schinese: 在全歼所有敌军部队的条件下打赢一场战役战斗
description.tchinese: 在全滅所有敵軍單位的條件下打贏一場戰役戰鬥。
description.russian: Выиграйте битву кампании, полностью уничтожив все вражеские отряды.
description.polish: Wygraj bitwę w kampanii, całkowicie pozbywając się wrogich jednostek.
description.czech: Vyhraj v kampani bitvu tím, že zcela vyhubíš všechny nepřátele.
description.turkish: Tüm düşman birimlerini tamamen yok ederek sefer savaşı kazan.
description.brazilian: Vença uma batalha de campanha, eliminando todas as unidades inimigas.

description.english: Cause more damage to a unit due to its weakness against fire.
description.german: Verursacht mehr Schaden an einer Einheit aufgrund ihrer Schwäche gegenüber Feuer.
description.french: Infligez plus de dégâts à une unité en raison de sa vulnérabilité face au feu.
description.italian: Causa più danni a un'unità a causa della sua vulnerabilità al fuoco.
description.koreana: 화염에 대한 약점을 이용해서 부대에게 더 큰 피해를 유발하십시오.
description.spanish: Causa más daño a una unidad a causa de su debilidad contra el fuego.
description.schinese: 利用部队火焰抗性较弱的特点对一支部队造成更多伤害
description.tchinese: 利用一單位火焰抗性較弱的特點，對該單位造成更多傷害。
description.russian: Нанесите дополнительный урон отряду, пользуясь его уязвимостью к огню.
description.polish: Zadaj większe obrażenia jednostce podatnej na ogień.
description.czech: Způsob jednotce vyšší zranění v důsledku její nízké odolnosti proti ohni.
description.turkish: Birimin ateşe olan zayıflığı yüzünden daha fazla hasar verir.
description.brazilian: Cause dano extra a uma unidade que seja fraca contra fogo.

description.english: Get an Undead/Goblin/Chaos/Empire militia unit to the highest level of experience.
description.german: Erreicht die höchste Erfahrungsstufe mit einer Milizeinheit der Untoten, Goblins, des Chaos oder Imperiums.
description.french: Faites monter une milice composée de Morts-Vivants, Gobelins, unités du Chaos ou unités de l'Empire au niveau d'expérience maximum.
description.italian: Porta una milizia di Nonmorti, di Goblin, del Caos o dell'Impero al più alto livello d'esperienza.
description.koreana: 언데드/고블린/카오스/제국 민병대로 최고 경험치 레벨을 달성하세요.
description.spanish: Haz que una unidad de milicia de los No Muertos/Goblins/Caos/Imperio llegue al nivel máximo de experiencia.
description.schinese: 将一支亡灵/地精/混沌/帝国民兵部队升至最高经验等级
description.tchinese: 將一支亡靈/地精/混沌/帝國民兵部隊升至最高經驗等級。
description.russian: Позвольте отряду ополчения нежити, гоблинов, Хаоса или Империи достичь максимального уровня.
description.polish: Awansuj podstawową jednostkę nieumarłych/goblinów/Chaosu/Imperium na najwyższy poziom doświadczenia.
description.czech: Dosáhni s jednotkou domobrany nemrtvých / goblinů / Chaosu / Říše nejvyšší úrovně zkušeností.
description.turkish: Bir Hortlak/Goblin/Kaos/İmparatorluk milis birimini mümkün olan en yüksek tecrübe seviyesine yükselt.
description.brazilian: Melhore uma unidade de milícia do Caos/Império/Goblins/Mortos-vivos ao nível máximo de experiência.

description.english: Have 10 magic weapons or items of magic armour.
description.german: Seid im Besitz von 10 magischen Waffen oder Rüstungsteilen.
description.french: Obtenez 10 armes ou armures magiques.
description.italian: Fai in modo di avere 10 Armi magiche o parti dell'Armatura Magica.
description.koreana: 마법 무기나 마법 갑옷 아이템을 10개 이상 보유하세요.
description.spanish: Ten 10 Armas mágicas o elementos de una Armadura mágica.
description.schinese: 拥有10件魔法武器或魔法盔甲
description.tchinese: 擁有10件魔法武器或魔法盔甲。
description.russian: Обзаведитесь 10 видами магического оружия или доспехов.
description.polish: Posiadaj 10 magicznych rodzajów broni lub elementów magicznego pancerza.
description.czech: Měj 10 magických zbraní nebo součástí zbroje.
description.turkish: 10 tane büyülü silah ya da büyülü zırhın eşyalarından edin.
description.brazilian: Obtenha 10 armas mágicas ou itens de armadura mágica.

displayName.english: The Long War, the Endless Hunt
displayName.german: Der Lange Krieg, die Endlose Jagd
displayName.french: Une longue guerre, une chasse sans fin
displayName.italian: La Lunga Guerra, la Caccia Infinita
displayName.spanish: La larga guerra, la Cacería eterna
displayName.brazilian: A Longa Guerra, A Caçada Infindável

description.english: Playing as Beastmen, have a raiding income of 6,000.
description.german: Erspielt Euch als Tiermenschen ein Einkommen durch Überfälle von 6.000.
description.french: Incarnez les Hommes-bêtes et obtenez un revenu dû aux raids de 6000.
description.italian: Gioca con gli Uominibestia, totalizza un profitto di 6,000 dalle incursioni
description.koreana: 비스트맨으로 진행하여 6,000에 상당하는 습격 수입을 얻으세요.
description.spanish: Juega con los Hombres Bestia y consigue unos ingresos por asaltos de 6000.
description.schinese: 扮演野兽人，获得6000拦路劫掠收入
description.tchinese: 扮演野獸人，獲得6000攔路劫掠收入。
description.russian: Играя за зверолюдов, получите доход от налетов в размере 6000.
description.polish: Grając zwierzoludźmi, uzyskaj przychód z wypraw łupieżczych równy 6 000 sztuk złota.
description.czech: Hraj za bestie a získej příjmy z nájezdů ve výši 6 000.

description.german: Gewinnt als Tiermenschen 10 Hinterhaltgefechte in einer einzigen Kampagne.

description.koreana: 비스트맨으로 진행하여 싱글 캠페인에서 10회의 매복전을 승리하세요.
description.spanish: Juega con los Hombres Bestia y gana 10 batallas de emboscada en una sola campaña.
description.schinese: 扮演野兽人，在单场战役中打赢10场伏击战
description.tchinese: 扮演野獸人，在單場戰役中打贏10場伏擊戰。

description.turkish: Canavaradamlar olarak oynarken, tek bir sefer esnasında 10 pusu muharebesi kazan.
description.brazilian: Jogando com os Homens-fera, vença 10 batalhas de emboscada em uma única campanha.

description.english: Playing as Beastmen, raze the Imperial capital at Altdorf and the Bretonnian capital at Couronne.
description.german: Reißt als Tiermenschen die imperiale Hauptstadt Altdorf und die bretonische Hauptstadt Couronne nieder.

description.koreana: 비스트맨으로 진행하여 알트도르프의 제국 수도와 쿠오롱의 브레토니아 수도를 파괴하세요.
description.spanish: Juega con los Hombres Bestia y arrasa la capital del Imperio, Altdorf, y la capital de Bretonia, Couronne.
description.schinese: 扮演野兽人，毁灭帝国首都阿尔道夫与巴托尼亚首都哥隆尼
description.tchinese: 扮演野獸人，毀滅帝國首都阿爾多夫與巴托尼亞首都哥隆尼。
description.russian: Играя за зверолюдов, разрушьте имперскую столицу Альтдорф и бретонскую столицу Куронн.
description.polish: Grając zwierzoludźmi, zniszcz imperialną stolicę Altdorfu i bretońską stolicę Couronne.
description.czech: Hraj za bestie a srovnej se zemí říšské hlavní město Altdorf a bretonské hlavní město Couronne.
description.turkish: Canavaradamlar olarak oynarken, Altdorf’taki İmparatorluk başkentini ve Couronne’deki Bretonya başkentini yerle bir et.
description.brazilian: Jogando com os Homens-fera, devaste a Capital Imperial em Altdorf e a capital bretoniana em Couronne.

displayName.brazilian: Rasgando a Pele até a Alma

description.english: Playing as Beastmen, recruit a Cygor to one of your armies.

description.brazilian: Jogando com os Homens-fera, vença a campanha grandiosa.

description.tchinese: 扮演諾斯卡或隆冬之牙，招募一隻猛獁象。
description.russian: Играя за Норску или Зимний Клык, наймите мамонта.
description.polish: Grając jako Norska lub Zimowy Kieł, zwerbuj mamuta.
description.czech: Při hře za Norsku nebo Zimní zub naverbuj mamuta.
description.turkish: Norska veya Kışdişi olarak oynarken, bir Mamut yetiştir.
description.brazilian: Jogando com Norsca ou Invernoperfurante, recrute um Mamute.

description.english: Playing as Norsca or the Wintertooth, win a campaign on any difficulty.
description.german: Gewinnt eine Kampagne als Norsca oder Winterzahn auf einer beliebigen Schwierigkeitsstufe.
description.french: Remportez une campagne de n'importe quelle difficulté en incarnant Norsca ou le Croc de l'Hiver.
description.italian: Vinci una campagna a qualsiasi difficoltà giocando con la Norsca o gli Zannadinverno.
description.koreana: 노스카나 윈터투스로 진행하여 아무 난이도로 캠페인을 승리하십시오.
description.spanish: Gana una campaña en cualquier dificultad jugando con Norsca o Diente Invernal.
description.schinese: 扮演诺斯卡或冬牙，打赢任何难度下的战役
description.tchinese: 在任何難度下，扮演諾斯卡或隆冬之牙贏得一場戰役。
description.russian: Играя за Норску или Зимний Клык, успешно завершите кампанию на любой сложности.
description.polish: Grając jako Norska lub Zimowy Kieł, przejdź kampanię na dowolnym poziomie trudności.
description.czech: Při hře za Norsku nebo Zimní zub vyhraj kampaň na libovolnou obtížnost.
description.turkish: Norska veya Kışdişi olarak oynarken, herhangi bir zorluk seviyesinde bir sefer kazan.
description.brazilian: Jogando com Norsca ou Invernoperfurante, vença uma campanha de qualquer dificuldade.

description.english: Playing as Norsca or the Wintertooth, win a campaign on Very Hard or Legendary difficulty.
description.german: Gewinnt eine Kampagne als Norsca oder Winterzahn auf der Schwierigkeitsstufe Sehr schwer oder Legendär.
description.french: Remportez une campagne de difficulté très difficile ou légendaire en incarnant Norsca ou le Croc de l'Hiver.
description.italian: Vinci una campagna a difficoltà Molto difficile o Leggendaria giocando con la Norsca o gli Zannadinverno.
description.koreana: 노스카나 윈터투스로 진행하여 매우 어려움이나 전설 난이도로 캠페인을 승리하십시오.
description.spanish: Gana una campaña en dificultad Muy difícil o Legendaria jugando con Norsca o Diente Invernal.
description.schinese: 扮演诺斯卡或冬牙，以极难或传奇难度打赢战役
description.tchinese: 在困難或傳奇難度下，扮演諾斯卡或隆冬之牙贏得一場戰役。
description.russian: Играя за Норску или Зимний Клык, успешно завершите кампанию на сложности "Очень высокая" или "Легендарная".
description.polish: Grając jako Norska lub Zimowy Kieł, przejdź kampanię na bardzo wysokim lub legendarnym poziomie trudności.
description.czech: Při hře za Norsku nebo Zimní zub vyhraj kampaň na velmi těžkou nebo legendární obtížnost.
description.turkish: Norska veya Kışdişi olarak oynarken, Çok Zor ya da Efsanevi zorluk seviyesinde bir sefer kazan.
description.brazilian: Jogando com Norsca ou Invernoperfurante, vença uma campanha Muito Difícil ou Lendária.

description.english: Playing as Norsca, destroy the Wintertooth faction.
description.german: Zerstört als Norsca die Winterzahn-Fraktion.
description.french: Détruisez la faction Croc de l'Hiver en incarnant Norsca.
description.italian: Sconfiggi la fazione degli Zannadinverno giocando con la Norsca.
description.koreana: 노스카로 진행하여 윈터투스 진영을 격파하십시오.
description.spanish: Destruye la facción de Diente Invernal jugando con Norsca.
description.schinese: 扮演诺斯卡，摧毁冬牙派系
description.tchinese: 扮演諾斯卡，摧毀隆冬之牙派系。
description.russian: Играя за Норску, уничтожьте фракцию Зимний Клык.
description.polish: Grając jako Norska, zniszcz frakcję Zimowy Kieł.
description.czech: Při hře za Norsku znič frakci Zimní zub.
description.turkish: Norska olarak oynarken, Kışdişi fraksiyonunu yok et.
description.brazilian: Jogando com Norsca, destrua a facção Invernoperfurante.

displayName.polish: Nie ma to jak w domu

description.english: Playing as the Wintertooth, occupy the settlement of Erengrad in Troll Country.
description.german: Besetzt als Winterzahn die Siedlung Erengrad im Land der Trolle.
description.french: Occupez la colonie d'Erengrad dans le Pays des Trolls en incarnant le Croc de l'Hiver.
description.italian: Occupa l'insediamento di Erengrad nella Terra dei Troll giocando con gli Zannadinverno.
description.koreana: 윈터투스로 진행하여 트롤 지방의 에렌그라드 정착지를 점거하십시오.
description.spanish: Ocupa el asentamiento de Erengrado en el Territorio Troll jugando con Diente Invernal.
description.schinese: 扮演冬牙，占领巨魔国度的厄伦格拉德城镇
description.tchinese: 扮演隆冬之牙，佔領巨魔國度的厄倫格拉德。
description.russian: Играя за Зимний Клык, оккупируйте поселение Эренгард в Стране Троллей.
description.polish: Grając jako Zimowy Kieł, okupuj osadę Erengrad w Krainie Trolli.
description.czech: Při hře za Zimní zub obsaď sídlo Erengrad v Trollí zemi.
description.turkish: Kışdişi olarak oynarken, Trol Yurdu’ndaki Erengrad yerleşim yerini işgal et.
description.brazilian: Jogando com Invernoperfurante, ocupe o povoado de Erengrad no Território dos Trolls.
